Test.Name: PTZ service is supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported

Test.Name: PTZ service is not supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse does not include service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is not supported

Test.Name: PTZ service is supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices only supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: not supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported

Test.Name: PTZ service is not supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices only is supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse does not include service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, all PTZ features are supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description:
GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends one PTZ Node in GetNodes response
SupportedPTZSpaces.ContinousPanTiltVelocitySpace element is present in the PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.ContinousZoomVelocitySpace element is present in the PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.AbsolutePanTiltPositionSpace element is present in the PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.AbsoluteZoomPositionSpace element is present in the PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.RelativePanTiltTranslationSpace is present in the PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.RelativeZoomTranslationSpace is present in the PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.PanTiltSpeedSpace is present in the PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.ZoomSpeedSpace is present in the PTZNode MaximumNumberOfPresets > 0 in the PTZNode one AuxiliaryCommands element is present in first PTZNode HomeSupported element is defined as true in first PTZNode (HomePosition.Configurable and HomePosition.Fixed are undefined)

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported
Absolute Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Absolute Zoom movement function is supported Relative Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Relative Zoom movement function is supported Continuous Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Continous Zoom movement function is supported Auxiliary operations is supported Preset position function is supported Speed for Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Speed for Zoom movement function is supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, all PTZ features are supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description:
GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends some PTZ Nodes in GetNodes response (TT shell use the first node for feature discovery)
SupportedPTZSpaces.ContinousPanTiltVelocitySpace element is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.ContinousZoomVelocitySpace element is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.AbsolutePanTiltPositionSpace element is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.AbsoluteZoomPositionSpace element is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.RelativePanTiltTranslationSpace is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.RelativeZoomTranslationSpace is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.PanTiltSpeedSpace is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.ZoomSpeedSpace is present in the first PTZNode MaximumNumberOfPresets > 0 in the first PTZNode one AuxiliaryCommands element is present in the first PTZNode HomeSupported element is defined as true in the first PTZNode (HomePosition.Configurable and HomePosition.Fixed are undefined)

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported
Absolute Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Absolute Zoom movement function is supported Relative Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Relative Zoom movement function is supported Continuous Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Continous Zoom movement function is supported Auxiliary operations is supported Preset position function is supported Speed for Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Speed for Zoom movement function is supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, PanTilt PTZ features are not supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description:
GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace
SupportedPTZSpaces.ContinousPanTiltVelocitySpace element is not present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.ContinousZoomVelocitySpace element is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.AbsolutePanTiltPositionSpace element is not present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.AbsoluteZoomPositionSpace element is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.RelativePanTiltTranslationSpace is not present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.RelativeZoomTranslationSpace is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.PanTiltSpeedSpace is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.ZoomSpeedSpace is present in the first PTZNode MaximumNumberOfPresets > 0 in the first PTZNode one AuxiliaryCommands element is present in the first PTZNode HomeSupported element is defined as true in the first PTZNode

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported
Absolute Pan/Tilt movement function is not supported Absolute Zoom movement function is supported Relative Pan/Tilt movement function is not supported Relative Zoom movement function is supported Continuous Pan/Tilt movement function is not supported Continous Zoom movement function is supported Auxiliary operations is supported Preset position function is supported Speed for Pan/Tilt movement function is not supported Speed for Zoom movement function is supported HomePosition is supported (HomePosition.Configurable and HomePosition.Fixed are undefined)

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, Zoom movement PTZ features are not supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description:
GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends some PTZ Nodes in GetNodes response (TT shell use the first node for feature discovery)
SupportedPTZSpaces.ContinousPanTiltVelocitySpace element is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.ContinousZoomVelocitySpace element is not present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.AbsolutePanTiltPositionSpace element is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.AbsoluteZoomPositionSpace element is not present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.RelativePanTiltTranslationSpace is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.RelativeZoomTranslationSpace is not present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.PanTiltSpeedSpace is present in the first PTZNode SupportedPTZSpaces.ZoomSpeedSpace is present in the first PTZNode MaximumNumberOfPresets > 0 in the first PTZNode one AuxiliaryCommands element is present in the first PTZNode HomeSupported element is defined as true in the first PTZNode (HomePosition.Configurable and HomePosition.Fixed are undefined)

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported
Absolute Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Absolute Zoom movement function is not supported Relative Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Relative Zoom movement function is not supported Continuous Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Continous Zoom movement function is not supported Auxiliary operations is supported Preset position function is supported Speed for Pan/Tilt movement function is supported Speed for Zoom movement function is supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, all PTZ features are supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description:
GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends one PTZ Node in GetNodes response
SupportedPTZSpaces element is not present in the PTZNode MaximumNumberOfPresets > 0 in the PTZNode one AuxiliaryCommands element is present in first PTZNode HomeSupported element is defined as true in first PTZNode (HomePosition.Configurable and HomePosition.Fixed are undefined)

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported
Absolute move is NOT suppored Absolute Pan/Tilt movement function is not supported Absolute Zoom movement function is not supported Relative move is NOT supported Relative Pan/Tilt movement function is not supported Relative Zoom movement function is not supported Continuous move is supported Continuous Pan/Tilt movement function is not supported Continous Zoom movement function is not supported Auxiliary operations is supported Preset position function is supported Speed is NOT supported Speed for Pan/Tilt movement function is not supported Speed for Zoom movement function is not supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, Presets is not supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description:
GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends one PTZ Node in GetNodes response
MaximumNumberOfPresets = 0 in the PTZNode

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported Preset position function is NOT supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, Home position is not supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends one PTZ Node in GetNodes response HomeSupported element is defined as false in first PTZNode

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported Home position function is NOT supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, Home position is not supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends one PTZ Node in GetNodes response HomeSupported element is not present in first PTZNode

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported Home position function is NOT supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: correct response, Auxiliary operations are not supported (GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends one PTZ Node in GetNodes response one AuxiliaryCommands element is not present in first PTZNode

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported Auxiliary operations is NOT supported

Test.Name: GetNodes: fault(GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends fault on GetNodes request DUT did not send any PTZ node during feature discovery

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported All functions support under PTZ Service is marked as undefined.

Test.Name: GetNodes: no response(GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends no response on GetNodes request DUT did not send any PTZ node during feature discovery

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported All functions support under PTZ Service is marked as undefined.

Test.Name: Home Position discovery procedure(GetServiceCapabilities metod)
Test.Description: GetServices and GetCapabilities are supported (DUT shall use GetSerciceCapabilities metod) GetServicesResponse includes service with “http://www.onvif.org/ver20/ptz/wsdl” namespace DUT sends one PTZ Node in GetNodes response HomeSupported element is defined as true in first PTZNode

ExpectedResult.TestSummary: GetCapabilities: supported GetServices: supported PTZ service is supported Home position function is supported
